slide.title: Constructors/Destructors
slide.example:
<?php
	class Construction {
		var $area;
		function __construct($area) {
			$this->$area = $area;
		}
		function __destruct() {
			echo "Leaving {$this->area}\n";
		}
	}
	
	$c = new Construction('London');
	$vegas = $c;
	$vegas->area = "Las Vegas";

	echo "\$c = NULL\n";
	$c = NULL;
	echo "\$vegas = NULL\n";
	$vegas = NULL;
? >
$c = NULL $vegas = NULL Leaving Las Vegas EOS
